title: Asos fashions a spending nightmare
text:
Well done to Asos chief Nick Beighton. Chief executives come under huge criticism when they get their forecasts wrong but the boss of Asos was bang on with his for a change.

He said 2019 would be bad, and he was absolutely right, it has been. In fact, it’s been a terrible year for the fashion website, the first time he’s got his forecasts right in ages.

Shareholders were so chuffed, that its share price shot up nearly a quarter despite some shocking numbers.

Annual pre-tax profits have crashed by more than two-thirds to £33m, “restructuring costs” have doubled to £51m, and a £43m cash pile has turned into net debts of £90m. Meanwhile profit margins have crashed from around 8pc to roughly 1pc...
description: Well done to Asos chief Nick Beighton.
